bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Authority for government to perform certain activities

bcl:definition.bcl:text: cannabis means fresh marihuana, dried marihuana and cannabis oil, as those terms are defined in section 1 (1) of the Access to Cannabis for Medical Purposes Regulations made under the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Canada) and marihuana plants or seeds, within the meaning of those regulations;
provide has the same meaning as in section 2 (1) of the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Canada).

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The government is authorized to possess, provide, send, deliver and transport cannabis and offer to perform any of those activities.

bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 3 of the Cannabis Distribution Act, the government may not sell cannabis.
This regulation is repealed when section 204 (1) of the Cannabis Act (Canada) comes into force.
